paragraphs.text: We are the last generation that can fight climate change. We have a duty to act.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: This year the UN marks its 70th anniversary
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Sadly, there is little time for reflection or celebration
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: More pressing are the competing demands and challenges fuelled by an upsurge in conflict, disease and human suffering
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: These compel the international community to step up and provide the leadership needed to tackle them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Ebola continues to plague west Africa
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: For some of the affected countries, struggling to overcome the effects of bitter civil war, the outbreak has been a major setback for development
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We are beginning to see some improvements
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: During my visit to the region in December, I was deeply moved by the efforts of local Ebola responders and health workers from across Africa and the world
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: But
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: rebuilding shattered lives and economies will require significantly more resources and long-term commitment
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: conflicts raged
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: extremism rose
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: 2014 pushed the UN's humanitarian, peacekeeping and diplomatic efforts to the limit
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: More than 100 million people needed assistance
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: An unprecedented number of UN troops and police are deployed in highly volatile security environments
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The elimination of Syria's chemical weapons programme was a major achievement
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the conflict continues to inflict immense suffering and will soon enter its fifth year
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: bitter winter conditions set in
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: millions of refugees are in need of life-saving humanitarian assistance
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The presence of thousands of foreign terrorist fighters there and in Iraq has added a further volatile dimension
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Groups responsible for atrocities have capitalised on a legacy of atrocious governance towards disenfranchised populations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Our response to brutality and extremism cannot be limited to military action, important as it is
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We must address the conditions that give rise to such poison in the first place
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the same vein, those conducting military actions against terrorists must be sure that such efforts fully observe human rights
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As we have seen time and again
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: failure to do so can end up serving as a recruiting agent for terrorists
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Elsewhere, the recent appalling terrorist attacks in Paris show how vulnerable any society can be
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Countries in Europe and elsewhere have witnessed a deeply worrying escalation of tensions between communities and within societies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Giving in to hatred and sowing division only guarantees a spiral of violence- precisely what terrorists seek
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We must not fall into that trap
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Addressing discord in a manner that solves, rather than multiplies, the problem may be the greatest test our human family faces in the 21st century
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There is a long list of other hot-spots- stretching from Nigeria to Yemen, from the rise in fighting in Darfur to the transition in Afghanistan
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Conflict in Ukraine has endangered security and stability in Europe, and reanimated the ghosts of the cold war
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Israelis and Palestinians must ease the explosive situation in Gaza and the West Bank, and move away from confrontation and towards a negotiated settlement
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But in a year marked by turmoil, UN member states have also proposed an initial draft set of sustainable development goals that will guide anti- poverty efforts for the next generation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Further negotiations will begin this month and culminate at a special summit in New York in September with the adoption of a development agenda
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: that can help tackle inequality, empower women and girls, and promote shared prosperity
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Climate action took on significant momentum with major announcements by the EU, the US and China, and a successful climate conference in Lima, Peru
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: that kept complex negotiations on track
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We must aim high: for the adoption of an ambitious and universal agreement in Paris in December to keep the rise in global temperatures below the dangerous threshold of 2C
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Ours is the first generation that can end poverty, and the last that can take steps to avoid the worst impacts of climate change
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In this 70th anniversary year in which we renew our commitment to the goals and principles of the UN charter, the international community must rise to the moment
paragraphs.label: assumption
